sentences.en: A newer anti-HIV drug called pyridinone caused HIV to mutate into a form which could not reproduce or infect new cells.
sentences.cn: 一种叫作吡啶酮的新型抗艾滋病药物能促使艾滋病毒变异，使其不能繁殖，也不会再感染新的细胞。

sentences.en: But public health experts fear the virus could mutate, and among humans, causing a deadly pandemic.
sentences.cn: 但是公共卫生组织的专家担心病毒会变异, 然后实现人传人, 造成灾难性的疫病.

sentences.en: Can. No matter animal cell still is plant cell, can mutate.
sentences.cn: 会.不管动物细胞还是植物细胞, 都会变异.

sentences.en: Chemotherapy and radiation can cause cancer cells to mutate and become resistant and difficult to destroy.
sentences.cn: 化疗和放疗能致使癌细胞变异和具有抵抗力,进而难以被破坏.

sentences.en: Human life and the universe continue to mutate constantly and are thought of as essentially impermanent.
sentences.cn: 人生和宇宙生生不息地变迁,被认为是无常之物.

sentences.en: Living machines reproduce, but as they do they mutate.
sentences.cn: 没错,活的机器会繁殖, 但是,它也会突变.

sentences.en: Or they also able to mutate so they cause less serious disease.
sentences.cn: 或者变异成引起不那么严重的疾病的病毒.

sentences.en: Scientists warn that the virus could mutate into a much deadlier form.
sentences.cn: 科学家们警告,该病毒可能变异成更致命的形式.

sentences.en: Scientists worry that the flu could mutate into a toughened more contagious form.
sentences.cn: 科学家们担心,禽流感病毒可能会变异出更可怕、更具传染性的变种.

sentences.en: Simple organisms like bacteria mutate rapidly.
sentences.cn: 像细菌那样的简单有机体突变的速度很快。

sentences.en: SIV can mutate a form that allows it to pass from human to human.
sentences.cn: 猪流感病毒可以变异成为能在人群中传播的毒株.

sentences.en: the ability of the virus to mutate into new forms
sentences.cn: 病毒变异成新菌株的能力

sentences.en: The scientists identified a protean protein that inactivates the flu virus before it can mutate.
sentences.cn: 科学家发现一种蛋白可以在流感病毒变异前使其失去活性.

sentences.en: The technique has been to mutate the genes by irradiation or chemicals.
sentences.cn: 该技术是通过放射线照射或者使用化学方法使基因变异。

sentences.en: Then we use free function mutate ( mutant ) to get the view.
sentences.cn: 然后我们用普通函数mutate ( mutant ) 来获得视图.

sentences.en: Thethe flu virus to mutate rapidly stems from its inability to accurately copy itself.
sentences.cn: 流感病毒变异迅速源于它不能精确地复制自己.

words.tran_cn: 易变性；性情不定；突变性
诱导有机体突变的物质

trans.tran_en: if an animal or plant mutates, it becomes different from others of the same kind, because of a change in its  genetic  structure
